			limit = {
				owner_under_PREV = yes

				set_variable = { which = r_prov_rel_zun_pagan_pct which = r_prov_rel_zun_pagan }
				multiply_variable = { which = r_prov_rel_zun_pagan_pct value = 100 }
				divide_variable = { which = r_prov_rel_zun_pagan_pct which = r_prov }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { check_variable = { which = r_prov_rel_hellenic_pagan_reformed value > 0 } }
				set_variable = { which = r_prov_rel_hellenic_pagan_reformed_pct which = r_prov_rel_hellenic_pagan_reformed }
				multiply_variable = { which = r_prov_rel_hellenic_pagan_reformed_pct value = 100 }
				divide_variable = { which = r_prov_rel_hellenic_pagan_reformed_pct which = r_prov }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { check_variable = { which = r_prov_rel_hellenic_pagan value > 0 } }
				set_variable = { which = r_prov_rel_hellenic_pagan_pct which = r_prov_rel_hellenic_pagan }
				multiply_variable = { which = r_prov_rel_hellenic_pagan_pct value = 100 }
				divide_variable = { which = r_prov_rel_hellenic_pagan_pct which = r_prov }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { check_variable = { which = r_prov_rel_bon_reformed value > 0 } }
				set_variable = { which = r_prov_rel_bon_reformed_pct which = r_prov_rel_bon_reformed }
				multiply_variable = { which = r_prov_rel_bon_reformed_pct value = 100 }
				divide_variable = { which = r_prov_rel_bon_reformed_pct which = r_prov }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { check_variable = { which = r_prov_rel_bon value > 0 } }
				set_variable = { which = r_prov_rel_bon_pct which = r_prov_rel_bon }
				multiply_variable = { which = r_prov_rel_bon_pct value = 100 }
				divide_variable = { which = r_prov_rel_bon_pct which = r_prov }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { check_variable = { which = r_prov_rel_zoroastrian value > 0 } }
				set_variable = { which = r_prov_rel_zoroastrian_pct which = r_prov_rel_zoroastrian }
				multiply_variable = { which = r_prov_rel_zoroastrian_pct value = 100 }
				divide_variable = { which = r_prov_rel_zoroastrian_pct which = r_prov }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { check_variable = { which = r_prov_rel_mazdaki value > 0 } }
				set_variable = { which = r_prov_rel_mazdaki_pct which = r_prov_rel_mazdaki }
				multiply_variable = { which = r_prov_rel_mazdaki_pct value = 100 }
				divide_variable = { which = r_prov_rel_mazdaki_pct which = r_prov }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { check_variable = { which = r_prov_rel_zurvanist value > 0 } }
				set_variable = { which = r_prov_rel_zurvanist_pct which = r_prov_rel_zurvanist }
				multiply_variable = { which = r_prov_rel_zurvanist_pct value = 100 }
				divide_variable = { which = r_prov_rel_zurvanist_pct which = r_prov }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { check_variable = { which = r_prov_rel_manichean value > 0 } }
				set_variable = { which = r_prov_rel_manichean_pct which = r_prov_rel_manichean }
				multiply_variable = { which = r_prov_rel_manichean_pct value = 100 }
				divide_variable = { which = r_prov_rel_manichean_pct which = r_prov }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { check_variable = { which = r_prov_rel_mandaean value > 0 } }
				set_variable = { which = r_prov_rel_mandaean_pct which = r_prov_rel_mandaean }
				multiply_variable = { which = r_prov_rel_mandaean_pct value = 100 }
				divide_variable = { which = r_prov_rel_mandaean_pct which = r_prov }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { check_variable = { which = r_prov_rel_yazidi value > 0 } }
				set_variable = { which = r_prov_rel_yazidi_pct which = r_prov_rel_yazidi }
				multiply_variable = { which = r_prov_rel_yazidi_pct value = 100 }
				divide_variable = { which = r_prov_rel_yazidi_pct which = r_prov }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { check_variable = { which = r_prov_rel_khurmazta value > 0 } }
				set_variable = { which = r_prov_rel_khurmazta_pct which = r_prov_rel_khurmazta }
				multiply_variable = { which = r_prov_rel_khurmazta_pct value = 100 }
				divide_variable = { which = r_prov_rel_khurmazta_pct which = r_prov }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { check_variable = { which = r_prov_rel_jewish value > 0 } }
				set_variable = { which = r_prov_rel_jewish_pct which = r_prov_rel_jewish }
				multiply_variable = { which = r_prov_rel_jewish_pct value = 100 }
				divide_variable = { which = r_prov_rel_jewish_pct which = r_prov }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { check_variable = { which = r_prov_rel_samaritan value > 0 } }
				set_variable = { which = r_prov_rel_samaritan_pct which = r_prov_rel_samaritan }
				multiply_variable = { which = r_prov_rel_samaritan_pct value = 100 }
				divide_variable = { which = r_prov_rel_samaritan_pct which = r_prov }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { check_variable = { which = r_prov_rel_karaite value > 0 } }
				set_variable = { which = r_prov_rel_karaite_pct which = r_prov_rel_karaite }
				multiply_variable = { which = r_prov_rel_karaite_pct value = 100 }
				divide_variable = { which = r_prov_rel_karaite_pct which = r_prov }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { check_variable = { which = r_prov_rel_hindu value > 0 } }
				set_variable = { which = r_prov_rel_hindu_pct which = r_prov_rel_hindu }
				multiply_variable = { which = r_prov_rel_hindu_pct value = 100 }
				divide_variable = { which = r_prov_rel_hindu_pct which = r_prov }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { check_variable = { which = r_prov_rel_buddhist value > 0 } }
				set_variable = { which = r_prov_rel_buddhist_pct which = r_prov_rel_buddhist }
				multiply_variable = { which = r_prov_rel_buddhist_pct value = 100 }
				divide_variable = { which = r_prov_rel_buddhist_pct which = r_prov }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { check_variable = { which = r_prov_rel_jain value > 0 } }
				set_variable = { which = r_prov_rel_jain_pct which = r_prov_rel_jain }
				multiply_variable = { which = r_prov_rel_jain_pct value = 100 }
				divide_variable = { which = r_prov_rel_jain_pct which = r_prov }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { check_variable = { which = r_prov_rel_taoist value > 0 } }
				set_variable = { which = r_prov_rel_taoist_pct which = r_prov_rel_taoist }
				multiply_variable = { which = r_prov_rel_taoist_pct value = 100 }
				divide_variable = { which = r_prov_rel_taoist_pct which = r_prov }
			}
		}
	}
}

emf_character_set_religion_to_reformed = {
	if = {
		limit = {
			OR = {
				religion = norse_pagan
				religion = tengri_pagan
				religion = baltic_pagan
				religion = finnish_pagan
				religion = aztec
				religion = slavic_pagan
				religion = west_african_pagan
				religion = zun_pagan
				religion = hellenic_pagan
				religion = bon
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { higher_real_tier_than = BARON }
			if = {
				limit = { real_tier = EMPEROR }
				religion_authority = { modifier = emperor_converted_from }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = { real_tier = KING }
				religion_authority = { modifier = king_converted_from }
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = { real_tier = DUKE }
				religion_authority = { modifier = duke_converted_from }
			}
			else = {
				religion_authority = { modifier = count_converted_from }
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = { # Needed to circumvent bug where converting theocracies immediately get replaced with a new character
				limit = { emf_requires_workaround_for_religion_switch = yes }
				set_flag = needs_fake_feudal_government
				set_government_type = fake_feudal_government
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { religion = norse_pagan }
			religion = norse_pagan_reformed
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { religion = tengri_pagan }
			religion = tengri_pagan_reformed
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { religion = baltic_pagan }
			religion = baltic_pagan_reformed
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { religion = finnish_pagan }
			religion = finnish_pagan_reformed
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { religion = aztec }
			religion = aztec_reformed
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { religion = slavic_pagan }
			religion = slavic_pagan_reformed
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { religion = west_african_pagan }
			religion = west_african_pagan_reformed
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { religion = zun_pagan }
			religion = zun_pagan_reformed
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { religion = hellenic_pagan }
			religion = hellenic_pagan_reformed
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { religion = bon }
			religion = bon_reformed
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_flag = needs_fake_feudal_government }
				emf_set_theocracy_government_safe = yes
				clr_flag = needs_fake_feudal_government
			}
			if = {
				limit = { higher_real_tier_than = BARON }
				if = {
					limit = { real_tier = EMPEROR }
					religion_authority = { modifier = emperor_converted_to }
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = { real_tier = KING }
					religion_authority = { modifier = king_converted_to }
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = { real_tier = DUKE }
					religion_authority = { modifier = duke_converted_to }
				}
				else = {
					religion_authority = { modifier = count_converted_to }
				}
			}
		}
		abdicate_holy_order_if_religion_changes_effect = yes
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_character_flag = king_converted
				NOT = { religion_group = christian }
			}
			clr_character_flag = king_converted
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_dharmic_religion_trigger = yes }
			set_character_flag = india_converted
			trigger_switch = { # Choose branch
				on_trigger = religion
				hindu = { character_event = { id = RoI.110 } }
				buddhist = { character_event = { id = RoI.111 } }
				jain = { character_event = { id = RoI.112 } }
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = { # Fast-track the decision to pick a pagan branch for the AI
				ai = yes
				OR = {
					has_religion_feature = religion_no_leader
					AND = {
						has_religion_features = no
						OR = {
							religion = west_african_pagan_reformed
							religion = bon_reformed
						}
					}
				}
				NOR = { 
					trait = pagan_branch_1
					trait = pagan_branch_2
					trait = pagan_branch_3 
					trait = pagan_branch_4
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { character_event = { id = HF.23016 days = 20 random = 20 } }
		}
	}
}

emf_reset_settable_religion_flags = {
	set_variable = { which = emf_peace_piety_gain value = 0.0 }
	set_variable = { which = emf_ai_convert_other_groups value = 2 }
	set_variable = { which = emf_ai_convert_same_group value = 2 }
	clr_flag = emf_peace_prestige_loss
	set_variable = { which = emf_aggression value = 1.0 }
	set_flag = emf_raised_vassal_opinion_loss
	clr_flag = emf_attacking_same_religion_piety_loss
	set_variable = { which = emf_max_wives value = 1 }
	set_variable = { which = emf_max_consorts value = 0 }
	clr_flag = emf_feminist
	clr_flag = emf_has_heir_designation
	set_variable = { which = emf_short_reign_opinion_year_mult value = -1000 }
	clr_flag = emf_uses_jizya_tax
	clr_flag = emf_can_retire_to_monastery
	clr_flag = emf_can_excommunicate
	clr_flag = emf_can_grant_divorce
	clr_flag = emf_can_grant_invasion_cb
	clr_flag = emf_can_grant_claim
	clr_flag = emf_pc_marriage
	clr_flag = emf_bs_marriage
	set_flag = emf_psc_marriage
	set_flag = emf_cousin_marriage
	clr_flag = emf_seafarer
	clr_flag = emf_allow_looting
	clr_flag = emf_allow_rivermovement
	clr_flag = emf_allow_viking_invasion
	clr_flag = emf_autocephaly
	clr_flag = emf_pentarchy
	clr_flag = emf_divine_blood
	clr_flag = emf_uses_decadence
	clr_flag = emf_can_have_antipopes
	clr_flag = emf_priests_can_marry
	set_flag = emf_priests_can_inherit
	clr_flag = emf_ignores_defensive_attrition
	clr_flag = emf_defensive_attrition
	set_flag = emf_matrilineal_marriages
	set_flag = emf_men_can_take_consorts
	clr_flag = emf_women_can_take_consorts
}

emf_set_default_flags_for_catholic = {
	set_flag = emf_playable
	set_flag = emf_ai_peaceful
	clr_flag = emf_hostile_within_group
	set_flag = emf_ai_fabricate_claims
	set_variable = { which = emf_peace_piety_gain value = 0.0 }
	set_variable = { which = emf_ai_convert_other_groups value = 2 }
	set_variable = { which = emf_ai_convert_same_group value = 2 }
	clr_flag = emf_peace_prestige_loss
	set_variable = { which = emf_aggression value = 1.0 }
	set_flag = emf_raised_vassal_opinion_loss
	clr_flag = emf_attacking_same_religion_piety_loss
	set_variable = { which = emf_max_wives value = 1 }
	set_variable = { which = emf_max_consorts value = 0 }
	clr_flag = emf_feminist
	clr_flag = emf_has_heir_designation
	set_variable = { which = emf_short_reign_opinion_year_mult value = -1000 }
	clr_flag = emf_uses_jizya_tax
	set_flag = emf_can_retire_to_monastery
	set_flag = emf_can_excommunicate
	set_flag = emf_can_grant_divorce
	clr_flag = emf_can_grant_invasion_cb
	set_flag = emf_can_grant_claim
	clr_flag = emf_pc_marriage
	clr_flag = emf_bs_marriage
	set_flag = emf_psc_marriage
	set_flag = emf_cousin_marriage
	clr_flag = emf_seafarer
	clr_flag = emf_allow_looting
	clr_flag = emf_allow_rivermovement
	clr_flag = emf_allow_viking_invasion
	clr_flag = emf_autocephaly
	clr_flag = emf_pentarchy
	clr_flag = emf_divine_blood
	clr_flag = emf_uses_decadence
	set_flag = emf_can_have_antipopes
	clr_flag = emf_priests_can_marry
	clr_flag = emf_priests_can_inherit
	clr_flag = emf_ignores_defensive_attrition
	clr_flag = emf_defensive_attrition
	set_flag = emf_matrilineal_marriages
	set_flag = emf_men_can_take_consorts
	clr_flag = emf_women_can_take_consorts
	set_flag = emf_investiture
	set_flag = emf_rel_head_defense
	clr_flag = emf_landed_kin_prestige_bonus
	clr_flag = emf_join_crusade_if_bordering_hostile
	set_variable = { which = emf_independence_war_score_bonus value = -1000 }
	set_flag = emf_can_demand_religious_conversion
	set_flag = emf_castes
	clr_flag = emf_caste_opinions
	set_flag = emf_allow_in_ruler_designer
	set_flag = emf_dynamic_cult
	set_flag = emf_secret_religion
}

emf_set_default_flags_for_cathar = {
	set_flag = emf_playable
	set_flag = emf_ai_peaceful
	clr_flag = emf_hostile_within_group
	set_flag = emf_ai_fabricate_claims
	set_variable = { which = emf_peace_piety_gain value = 0.0 }
	set_variable = { which = emf_ai_convert_other_groups value = 2 }
	set_variable = { which = emf_ai_convert_same_group value = 2 }
	clr_flag = emf_peace_prestige_loss
	set_variable = { which = emf_aggression value = 0.6 }
	set_flag = emf_raised_vassal_opinion_loss
	clr_flag = emf_attacking_same_religion_piety_loss
	set_variable = { which = emf_max_wives value = 1 }
	set_variable = { which = emf_max_consorts value = 0 }
	set_flag = emf_feminist
	clr_flag = emf_has_heir_designation
	set_variable = { which = emf_short_reign_opinion_year_mult value = -1000 }
	clr_flag = emf_uses_jizya_tax
	clr_flag = emf_can_retire_to_monastery
	clr_flag = emf_can_excommunicate
	set_flag = emf_can_grant_divorce
	clr_flag = emf_can_grant_invasion_cb
	clr_flag = emf_can_grant_claim
	clr_flag = emf_pc_marriage
	clr_flag = emf_bs_marriage
	set_flag = emf_psc_marriage
	set_flag = emf_cousin_marriage
	clr_flag = emf_seafarer
	clr_flag = emf_allow_looting
	clr_flag = emf_allow_rivermovement
	clr_flag = emf_allow_viking_invasion
	clr_flag = emf_autocephaly
	clr_flag = emf_pentarchy
	clr_flag = emf_divine_blood
	clr_flag = emf_uses_decadence
	clr_flag = emf_can_have_antipopes
	clr_flag = emf_priests_can_marry
	clr_flag = emf_priests_can_inherit
	clr_flag = emf_ignores_defensive_attrition
	clr_flag = emf_defensive_attrition
	set_flag = emf_matrilineal_marriages
	set_flag = emf_men_can_take_consorts
	clr_flag = emf_women_can_take_consorts
	set_flag = emf_investiture
	clr_flag = emf_rel_head_defense
	clr_flag = emf_landed_kin_prestige_bonus
	clr_flag = emf_join_crusade_if_bordering_hostile
	set_variable = { which = emf_independence_war_score_bonus value = -1000 }
	set_flag = emf_can_demand_religious_conversion
	set_flag = emf_castes
	clr_flag = emf_caste_opinions
	set_flag = emf_allow_in_ruler_designer
	set_flag = emf_dynamic_cult
	set_flag = emf_secret_religion
}

emf_set_default_flags_for_fraticelli = {
	set_flag = emf_playable
	set_flag = emf_ai_peaceful
	clr_flag = emf_hostile_within_group
	set_flag = emf_ai_fabricate_claims
	set_variable = { which = emf_peace_piety_gain value = 0.0 }
	set_variable = { which = emf_ai_convert_other_groups value = 2 }
	set_variable = { which = emf_ai_convert_same_group value = 2 }
	clr_flag = emf_peace_prestige_loss
	set_variable = { which = emf_aggression value = 1.0 }
	set_flag = emf_raised_vassal_opinion_loss
	clr_flag = emf_attacking_same_religion_piety_loss
	set_variable = { which = emf_max_wives value = 1 }
	set_variable = { which = emf_max_consorts value = 0 }
	clr_flag = emf_feminist
	clr_flag = emf_has_heir_designation
	set_variable = { which = emf_short_reign_opinion_year_mult value = -1000 }
	clr_flag = emf_uses_jizya_tax
	set_flag = emf_can_retire_to_monastery
	set_flag = emf_can_excommunicate
	set_flag = emf_can_grant_divorce
	clr_flag = emf_can_grant_invasion_cb
	set_flag = emf_can_grant_claim
	clr_flag = emf_pc_marriage
	clr_flag = emf_bs_marriage
	set_flag = emf_psc_marriage
	set_flag = emf_cousin_marriage
	clr_flag = emf_seafarer
	clr_flag = emf_allow_looting
	clr_flag = emf_allow_rivermovement
	clr_flag = emf_allow_viking_invasion
	clr_flag = emf_autocephaly
	clr_flag = emf_pentarchy
	clr_flag = emf_divine_blood
	clr_flag = emf_uses_decadence
	set_flag = emf_can_have_antipopes
	clr_flag = emf_priests_can_marry
	clr_flag = emf_priests_can_inherit
	clr_flag = emf_ignores_defensive_attrition
	clr_flag = emf_defensive_attrition

	set_flag = emf_men_can_take_consorts
	clr_flag = emf_women_can_take_consorts
	set_flag = emf_investiture
	set_flag = emf_rel_head_defense
	clr_flag = emf_landed_kin_prestige_bonus
	clr_flag = emf_join_crusade_if_bordering_hostile
	set_variable = { which = emf_independence_war_score_bonus value = -1000 }
	set_flag = emf_can_demand_religious_conversion
	set_flag = emf_castes
	clr_flag = emf_caste_opinions
	set_flag = emf_allow_in_ruler_designer
	set_flag = emf_dynamic_cult
	set_flag = emf_secret_religion
}

emf_set_default_flags_for_waldensian = {
	set_flag = emf_playable
	set_flag = emf_ai_peaceful
	clr_flag = emf_hostile_within_group
	set_flag = emf_ai_fabricate_claims
	set_variable = { which = emf_peace_piety_gain value = 0.0 }
	set_variable = { which = emf_ai_convert_other_groups value = 2 }
	set_variable = { which = emf_ai_convert_same_group value = 2 }
	clr_flag = emf_peace_prestige_loss
	set_variable = { which = emf_aggression value = 1.0 }
	set_flag = emf_raised_vassal_opinion_loss
	clr_flag = emf_attacking_same_religion_piety_loss
	set_variable = { which = emf_max_wives value = 1 }
	set_variable = { which = emf_max_consorts value = 0 }
	clr_flag = emf_feminist
	clr_flag = emf_has_heir_designation
	set_variable = { which = emf_short_reign_opinion_year_mult value = -1000 }
	clr_flag = emf_uses_jizya_tax
	set_flag = emf_can_retire_to_monastery
	clr_flag = emf_can_excommunicate
	set_flag = emf_can_grant_divorce
	clr_flag = emf_can_grant_invasion_cb
	clr_flag = emf_can_grant_claim
	clr_flag = emf_pc_marriage
	clr_flag = emf_bs_marriage
	set_flag = emf_psc_marriage
	set_flag = emf_cousin_marriage
	clr_flag = emf_seafarer
	clr_flag = emf_allow_looting
	clr_flag = emf_allow_rivermovement
	clr_flag = emf_allow_viking_invasion
	clr_flag = emf_autocephaly
	clr_flag = emf_pentarchy
	clr_flag = emf_divine_blood
	clr_flag = emf_uses_decadence
	clr_flag = emf_can_have_antipopes
	set_flag = emf_priests_can_marry
	set_flag = emf_priests_can_inherit
	clr_flag = emf_ignores_defensive_attrition
	clr_flag = emf_defensive_attrition
	set_flag = emf_matrilineal_marriages
	set_flag = emf_men_can_take_consorts
	clr_flag = emf_women_can_take_consorts
	clr_flag = emf_investiture
	clr_flag = emf_rel_head_defense
	clr_flag = emf_landed_kin_prestige_bonus
	clr_flag = emf_join_crusade_if_bordering_hostile
	set_variable = { which = emf_independence_war_score_bonus value = -1000 }
	set_flag = emf_can_demand_religious_conversion
	set_flag = emf_castes
	clr_flag = emf_caste_opinions
	set_flag = emf_allow_in_ruler_designer
	set_flag = emf_dynamic_cult
	set_flag = emf_secret_religion
}

	set_flag = emf_playable
	set_flag = emf_ai_peaceful
	clr_flag = emf_hostile_within_group
	set_flag = emf_ai_fabricate_claims
	set_variable = { which = emf_peace_piety_gain value = 0.0 }
	set_variable = { which = emf_ai_convert_other_groups value = 2 }
	set_variable = { which = emf_ai_convert_same_group value = 2 }
	clr_flag = emf_peace_prestige_loss
	set_variable = { which = emf_aggression value = 0.6 }
	set_flag = emf_raised_vassal_opinion_loss
	clr_flag = emf_attacking_same_religion_piety_loss
	set_variable = { which = emf_max_wives value = 1 }
	set_variable = { which = emf_max_consorts value = 0 }
	clr_flag = emf_feminist
	clr_flag = emf_has_heir_designation

	clr_flag = emf_uses_jizya_tax
	set_flag = emf_can_retire_to_monastery
	set_flag = emf_can_excommunicate
	set_flag = emf_can_grant_divorce

	clr_flag = emf_bs_marriage

	set_flag = emf_cousin_marriage
	clr_flag = emf_seafarer
	clr_flag = emf_allow_looting
	clr_flag = emf_allow_rivermovement
	clr_flag = emf_allow_viking_invasion
	clr_flag = emf_autocephaly
	clr_flag = emf_pentarchy
	clr_flag = emf_divine_blood
	clr_flag = emf_uses_decadence
	clr_flag = emf_can_have_antipopes
	set_flag = emf_priests_can_marry
	clr_flag = emf_priests_can_inherit
	clr_flag = emf_ignores_defensive_attrition
	clr_flag = emf_defensive_attrition

	clr_flag = emf_women_can_take_consorts

	clr_flag = emf_rel_head_defense
	clr_flag = emf_landed_kin_prestige_bonus

	set_flag = emf_dynamic_cult
	set_flag = emf_secret_religion
}

emf_set_default_flags_for_maronite = {
	set_flag = emf_playable
	set_flag = emf_ai_peaceful
	clr_flag = emf_hostile_within_group
	set_flag = emf_ai_fabricate_claims
	set_variable = { which = emf_peace_piety_gain value = 0.0 }
	set_variable = { which = emf_ai_convert_other_groups value = 2 }
	set_variable = { which = emf_ai_convert_same_group value = 2 }
	clr_flag = emf_peace_prestige_loss
	set_variable = { which = emf_aggression value = 1.0 }
	set_flag = emf_raised_vassal_opinion_loss
	clr_flag = emf_attacking_same_religion_piety_loss
	set_variable = { which = emf_max_wives value = 1 }
	set_variable = { which = emf_max_consorts value = 0 }
	clr_flag = emf_feminist
	clr_flag = emf_has_heir_designation
	set_variable = { which = emf_short_reign_opinion_year_mult value = -1000 }
	clr_flag = emf_uses_jizya_tax
	set_flag = emf_can_retire_to_monastery
	set_flag = emf_can_excommunicate
	set_flag = emf_can_grant_divorce
	clr_flag = emf_can_grant_invasion_cb
	clr_flag = emf_can_grant_claim
	clr_flag = emf_pc_marriage
	clr_flag = emf_bs_marriage
	set_flag = emf_psc_marriage
	set_flag = emf_cousin_marriage
	clr_flag = emf_seafarer
	clr_flag = emf_allow_looting
	clr_flag = emf_allow_rivermovement
	clr_flag = emf_allow_viking_invasion
	set_flag = emf_autocephaly
	clr_flag = emf_pentarchy
	clr_flag = emf_divine_blood
	clr_flag = emf_uses_decadence
	clr_flag = emf_can_have_antipopes
	clr_flag = emf_priests_can_marry
	clr_flag = emf_priests_can_inherit
	clr_flag = emf_ignores_defensive_attrition
	clr_flag = emf_defensive_attrition
	set_flag = emf_matrilineal_marriages
	set_flag = emf_men_can_take_consorts
	clr_flag = emf_women_can_take_consorts
	clr_flag = emf_investiture
	clr_flag = emf_rel_head_defense
	clr_flag = emf_landed_kin_prestige_bonus
	clr_flag = emf_join_crusade_if_bordering_hostile
	set_variable = { which = emf_independence_war_score_bonus value = -1000 }
	set_flag = emf_can_demand_religious_conversion
	set_flag = emf_castes
	clr_flag = emf_caste_opinions
	set_flag = emf_allow_in_ruler_designer
	set_flag = emf_dynamic_cult
	set_flag = emf_secret_religion
}

	clr_flag = emf_seafarer
	clr_flag = emf_allow_looting
	clr_flag = emf_allow_rivermovement
	clr_flag = emf_allow_viking_invasion
	clr_flag = emf_autocephaly
	clr_flag = emf_pentarchy
	clr_flag = emf_divine_blood
	clr_flag = emf_uses_decadence
	clr_flag = emf_can_have_antipopes
	set_flag = emf_priests_can_marry
	set_flag = emf_priests_can_inherit
	clr_flag = emf_ignores_defensive_attrition
	clr_flag = emf_defensive_attrition
	clr_flag = emf_matrilineal_marriages
	set_flag = emf_men_can_take_consorts
	clr_flag = emf_women_can_take_consorts
	clr_flag = emf_investiture
	clr_flag = emf_rel_head_defense
	set_flag = emf_landed_kin_prestige_bonus
	clr_flag = emf_join_crusade_if_bordering_hostile
	set_variable = { which = emf_independence_war_score_bonus value = -1000 }
	set_flag = emf_can_demand_religious_conversion
	set_flag = emf_castes
	clr_flag = emf_caste_opinions
	set_flag = emf_allow_in_ruler_designer
	set_flag = emf_dynamic_cult
	set_flag = emf_secret_religion
}

emf_set_default_flags_for_zikri = {
	set_flag = emf_playable
	clr_flag = emf_ai_peaceful
	set_flag = emf_hostile_within_group
	clr_flag = emf_ai_fabricate_claims
	set_variable = { which = emf_peace_piety_gain value = 0.0 }
	set_variable = { which = emf_ai_convert_other_groups value = 2 }
	set_variable = { which = emf_ai_convert_same_group value = 2 }
	clr_flag = emf_peace_prestige_loss
	set_variable = { which = emf_aggression value = 1.0 }
	set_flag = emf_raised_vassal_opinion_loss
	set_flag = emf_attacking_same_religion_piety_loss
	set_variable = { which = emf_max_wives value = 4 }
	set_variable = { which = emf_max_consorts value = 0 }
	clr_flag = emf_feminist
	clr_flag = emf_has_heir_designation
	set_variable = { which = emf_short_reign_opinion_year_mult value = -1000 }
	set_flag = emf_uses_jizya_tax
	clr_flag = emf_can_retire_to_monastery
	clr_flag = emf_can_excommunicate
	clr_flag = emf_can_grant_divorce
	clr_flag = emf_can_grant_invasion_cb
	clr_flag = emf_can_grant_claim
	clr_flag = emf_pc_marriage
	clr_flag = emf_bs_marriage
	clr_flag = emf_psc_marriage
	set_flag = emf_cousin_marriage
	clr_flag = emf_seafarer
	clr_flag = emf_allow_looting
	clr_flag = emf_allow_rivermovement
	clr_flag = emf_allow_viking_invasion
	clr_flag = emf_autocephaly
	clr_flag = emf_pentarchy
	clr_flag = emf_divine_blood
	clr_flag = emf_uses_decadence
	clr_flag = emf_can_have_antipopes
	set_flag = emf_priests_can_marry
	set_flag = emf_priests_can_inherit
	clr_flag = emf_ignores_defensive_attrition
	clr_flag = emf_defensive_attrition
	clr_flag = emf_matrilineal_marriages
	set_flag = emf_men_can_take_consorts
	clr_flag = emf_women_can_take_consorts
	clr_flag = emf_investiture
	clr_flag = emf_rel_head_defense
	set_flag = emf_landed_kin_prestige_bonus
	clr_flag = emf_join_crusade_if_bordering_hostile

	set_flag = emf_hostile_within_group
	clr_flag = emf_ai_fabricate_claims
	set_variable = { which = emf_peace_piety_gain value = 0.0 }
	set_variable = { which = emf_ai_convert_other_groups value = 2 }
	set_variable = { which = emf_ai_convert_same_group value = 2 }
	clr_flag = emf_peace_prestige_loss
	set_variable = { which = emf_aggression value = 1.0 }
	set_flag = emf_raised_vassal_opinion_loss
	set_flag = emf_attacking_same_religion_piety_loss
	set_variable = { which = emf_max_wives value = 4 }
	set_variable = { which = emf_max_consorts value = 0 }
	clr_flag = emf_feminist
	clr_flag = emf_has_heir_designation
	set_variable = { which = emf_short_reign_opinion_year_mult value = -1000 }
	set_flag = emf_uses_jizya_tax
	clr_flag = emf_can_retire_to_monastery
	clr_flag = emf_can_excommunicate
	clr_flag = emf_can_grant_divorce
	clr_flag = emf_can_grant_invasion_cb
	clr_flag = emf_can_grant_claim
	clr_flag = emf_pc_marriage
	clr_flag = emf_bs_marriage
	clr_flag = emf_psc_marriage
	set_flag = emf_cousin_marriage
	clr_flag = emf_seafarer
	clr_flag = emf_allow_looting
	clr_flag = emf_allow_rivermovement
	clr_flag = emf_allow_viking_invasion
	clr_flag = emf_autocephaly
	clr_flag = emf_pentarchy
	clr_flag = emf_divine_blood
	clr_flag = emf_uses_decadence
	clr_flag = emf_can_have_antipopes
	set_flag = emf_priests_can_marry
	set_flag = emf_priests_can_inherit
	clr_flag = emf_ignores_defensive_attrition
	clr_flag = emf_defensive_attrition
	clr_flag = emf_matrilineal_marriages
	set_flag = emf_men_can_take_consorts
	clr_flag = emf_women_can_take_consorts
	clr_flag = emf_investiture
	clr_flag = emf_rel_head_defense
	set_flag = emf_landed_kin_prestige_bonus
	clr_flag = emf_join_crusade_if_bordering_hostile
	set_variable = { which = emf_independence_war_score_bonus value = -1000 }
	set_flag = emf_can_demand_religious_conversion
	set_flag = emf_castes
	clr_flag = emf_caste_opinions
	set_flag = emf_allow_in_ruler_designer
	set_flag = emf_dynamic_cult
	set_flag = emf_secret_religion
}

	set_variable = { which = emf_ai_convert_same_group value = 2 }
	clr_flag = emf_peace_prestige_loss

	set_flag = emf_raised_vassal_opinion_loss

	set_variable = { which = emf_ai_convert_same_group value = 1 }
	set_flag = emf_peace_prestige_loss

	clr_flag = emf_raised_vassal_opinion_loss

	set_flag = emf_allow_viking_invasion
	clr_flag = emf_autocephaly
	clr_flag = emf_pentarchy
	clr_flag = emf_divine_blood
	clr_flag = emf_uses_decadence
	clr_flag = emf_can_have_antipopes

	set_flag = emf_priests_can_inherit

	clr_flag = emf_autocephaly
	clr_flag = emf_pentarchy
	clr_flag = emf_divine_blood
	clr_flag = emf_uses_decadence
	clr_flag = emf_can_have_antipopes
	set_flag = emf_priests_can_marry
	set_flag = emf_priests_can_inherit

	clr_flag = emf_allow_viking_invasion
	clr_flag = emf_autocephaly
	clr_flag = emf_pentarchy
	clr_flag = emf_divine_blood
	clr_flag = emf_uses_decadence
	clr_flag = emf_can_have_antipopes
	set_flag = emf_priests_can_marry
	set_flag = emf_priests_can_inherit
	set_flag = emf_ignores_defensive_attrition
	clr_flag = emf_defensive_attrition
	set_flag = emf_matrilineal_marriages
	set_flag = emf_men_can_take_consorts
	clr_flag = emf_women_can_take_consorts
	clr_flag = emf_investiture
	clr_flag = emf_rel_head_defense
	clr_flag = emf_landed_kin_prestige_bonus
	clr_flag = emf_join_crusade_if_bordering_hostile
	set_variable = { which = emf_independence_war_score_bonus value = 30 }
	clr_flag = emf_can_demand_religious_conversion
	set_flag = emf_castes
	clr_flag = emf_caste_opinions
	set_flag = emf_allow_in_ruler_designer
	set_flag = emf_dynamic_cult
	set_flag = emf_secret_religion
}

emf_set_default_flags_for_baltic_pagan_reformed = {
	set_flag = emf_playable
	clr_flag = emf_ai_peaceful
	set_flag = emf_hostile_within_group
	clr_flag = emf_ai_fabricate_claims
	set_variable = { which = emf_peace_piety_gain value = 0.0 }
	set_variable = { which = emf_ai_convert_other_groups value = 2 }
	set_variable = { which = emf_ai_convert_same_group value = 1 }
	clr_flag = emf_peace_prestige_loss
	set_variable = { which = emf_aggression value = 0.5 }
	set_flag = emf_raised_vassal_opinion_loss
	clr_flag = emf_attacking_same_religion_piety_loss
	set_variable = { which = emf_max_wives value = 1 }
	set_variable = { which = emf_max_consorts value = 3 }
	clr_flag = emf_feminist
	clr_flag = emf_has_heir_designation
	set_variable = { which = emf_short_reign_opinion_year_mult value = 1.5 }
	clr_flag = emf_uses_jizya_tax
	clr_flag = emf_can_retire_to_monastery
	clr_flag = emf_can_excommunicate
	clr_flag = emf_can_grant_divorce
	clr_flag = emf_can_grant_invasion_cb
	clr_flag = emf_can_grant_claim
	clr_flag = emf_pc_marriage
	clr_flag = emf_bs_marriage
	set_flag = emf_psc_marriage
	set_flag = emf_cousin_marriage
	clr_flag = emf_seafarer
	set_flag = emf_allow_looting
	clr_flag = emf_allow_rivermovement
	clr_flag = emf_allow_viking_invasion
	clr_flag = emf_autocephaly
	clr_flag = emf_pentarchy
	clr_flag = emf_divine_blood
	clr_flag = emf_uses_decadence
	clr_flag = emf_can_have_antipopes
	set_flag = emf_priests_can_marry
	set_flag = emf_priests_can_inherit
	clr_flag = emf_ignores_defensive_attrition
	clr_flag = emf_defensive_attrition
	set_flag = emf_matrilineal_marriages
	set_flag = emf_men_can_take_consorts
	clr_flag = emf_women_can_take_consorts
	clr_flag = emf_investiture
	clr_flag = emf_rel_head_defense
	clr_flag = emf_landed_kin_prestige_bonus
	set_flag = emf_join_crusade_if_bordering_hostile
	set_variable = { which = emf_independence_war_score_bonus value = -1000 }
	set_flag = emf_can_demand_religious_conversion
	set_flag = emf_castes
	clr_flag = emf_caste_opinions
	clr_flag = emf_allow_in_ruler_designer
	set_flag = emf_dynamic_cult
	set_flag = emf_secret_religion
}

	set_flag = emf_playable

	set_flag = emf_hostile_within_group
	clr_flag = emf_ai_fabricate_claims
	set_variable = { which = emf_peace_piety_gain value = 0.0 }
	set_variable = { which = emf_ai_convert_other_groups value = 2 }
	set_variable = { which = emf_ai_convert_same_group value = 2 }
	clr_flag = emf_peace_prestige_loss
	set_variable = { which = emf_aggression value = 1.0 }
	set_flag = emf_raised_vassal_opinion_loss
	clr_flag = emf_attacking_same_religion_piety_loss
	set_variable = { which = emf_max_wives value = 1 }
	set_variable = { which = emf_max_consorts value = 3 }
	clr_flag = emf_feminist
	clr_flag = emf_has_heir_designation
	set_variable = { which = emf_short_reign_opinion_year_mult value = -1000 }
	clr_flag = emf_uses_jizya_tax
	clr_flag = emf_can_retire_to_monastery
	clr_flag = emf_can_excommunicate
	clr_flag = emf_can_grant_divorce
	clr_flag = emf_can_grant_invasion_cb
	clr_flag = emf_can_grant_claim
	clr_flag = emf_pc_marriage
	clr_flag = emf_bs_marriage
	set_flag = emf_psc_marriage
	set_flag = emf_cousin_marriage
	clr_flag = emf_seafarer
	set_flag = emf_allow_looting
	clr_flag = emf_allow_rivermovement
	clr_flag = emf_allow_viking_invasion
	clr_flag = emf_autocephaly
	clr_flag = emf_pentarchy
	clr_flag = emf_divine_blood
	clr_flag = emf_uses_decadence
	clr_flag = emf_can_have_antipopes
	set_flag = emf_priests_can_marry
	set_flag = emf_priests_can_inherit
	clr_flag = emf_ignores_defensive_attrition
	clr_flag = emf_defensive_attrition
	set_flag = emf_matrilineal_marriages
	set_flag = emf_men_can_take_consorts
	set_flag = emf_women_can_take_consorts
	clr_flag = emf_investiture
	clr_flag = emf_rel_head_defense
	clr_flag = emf_landed_kin_prestige_bonus
	set_flag = emf_join_crusade_if_bordering_hostile
	set_variable = { which = emf_independence_war_score_bonus value = -1000 }
	set_flag = emf_can_demand_religious_conversion
	set_flag = emf_castes
	clr_flag = emf_caste_opinions
	clr_flag = emf_allow_in_ruler_designer
	set_flag = emf_dynamic_cult
	set_flag = emf_secret_religion
}

emf_set_default_flags_for_west_african_pagan = {
	set_flag = emf_playable
	clr_flag = emf_ai_peaceful
	set_flag = emf_hostile_within_group
	clr_flag = emf_ai_fabricate_claims
	set_variable = { which = emf_peace_piety_gain value = 0.0 }
	set_variable = { which = emf_ai_convert_other_groups value = 2 }
	set_variable = { which = emf_ai_convert_same_group value = 2 }
	clr_flag = emf_peace_prestige_loss
	set_variable = { which = emf_aggression value = 0.1 }
	set_flag = emf_raised_vassal_opinion_loss
	clr_flag = emf_attacking_same_religion_piety_loss
	set_variable = { which = emf_max_wives value = 1 }
	set_variable = { which = emf_max_consorts value = 3 }
	clr_flag = emf_feminist
	clr_flag = emf_has_heir_designation
	set_variable = { which = emf_short_reign_opinion_year_mult value = -1000 }
	clr_flag = emf_uses_jizya_tax
	clr_flag = emf_can_retire_to_monastery
	clr_flag = emf_can_excommunicate
	clr_flag = emf_can_grant_divorce
	clr_flag = emf_can_grant_invasion_cb
	clr_flag = emf_can_grant_claim
	clr_flag = emf_pc_marriage
	clr_flag = emf_bs_marriage
	set_flag = emf_psc_marriage
	set_flag = emf_cousin_marriage
	clr_flag = emf_seafarer
	set_flag = emf_allow_looting
	clr_flag = emf_allow_rivermovement
	clr_flag = emf_allow_viking_invasion
	clr_flag = emf_autocephaly
	clr_flag = emf_pentarchy
	clr_flag = emf_divine_blood
	clr_flag = emf_uses_decadence
	clr_flag = emf_can_have_antipopes
	set_flag = emf_priests_can_marry
	set_flag = emf_priests_can_inherit
	clr_flag = emf_ignores_defensive_attrition
	set_flag = emf_defensive_attrition
	set_flag = emf_matrilineal_marriages
	set_flag = emf_men_can_take_consorts
	set_flag = emf_women_can_take_consorts
	clr_flag = emf_investiture
	clr_flag = emf_rel_head_defense
	clr_flag = emf_landed_kin_prestige_bonus
	clr_flag = emf_join_crusade_if_bordering_hostile
	set_variable = { which = emf_independence_war_score_bonus value = 30 }
	clr_flag = emf_can_demand_religious_conversion
	set_flag = emf_castes
	clr_flag = emf_caste_opinions
	set_flag = emf_allow_in_ruler_designer

	set_flag = emf_secret_religion
}

	set_flag = emf_hostile_within_group

	set_variable = { which = emf_ai_convert_other_groups value = 2 }
	set_variable = { which = emf_ai_convert_same_group value = 1 }
	set_flag = emf_peace_prestige_loss

	clr_flag = emf_raised_vassal_opinion_loss
	clr_flag = emf_attacking_same_religion_piety_loss

	clr_flag = emf_bs_marriage

	set_flag = emf_cousin_marriage
	clr_flag = emf_seafarer
	set_flag = emf_allow_looting
	clr_flag = emf_allow_rivermovement
	set_flag = emf_allow_viking_invasion
	clr_flag = emf_autocephaly
	clr_flag = emf_pentarchy
	clr_flag = emf_divine_blood
	clr_flag = emf_uses_decadence
	clr_flag = emf_can_have_antipopes

	set_flag = emf_priests_can_inherit

	clr_flag = emf_autocephaly
	clr_flag = emf_pentarchy
	set_flag = emf_divine_blood
	clr_flag = emf_uses_decadence
	clr_flag = emf_can_have_antipopes
	clr_flag = emf_priests_can_marry
	set_flag = emf_priests_can_inherit
	clr_flag = emf_ignores_defensive_attrition
	clr_flag = emf_defensive_attrition
	set_flag = emf_matrilineal_marriages
	set_flag = emf_men_can_take_consorts
	clr_flag = emf_women_can_take_consorts
	clr_flag = emf_investiture
	clr_flag = emf_rel_head_defense
	clr_flag = emf_landed_kin_prestige_bonus
	set_flag = emf_join_crusade_if_bordering_hostile
	set_variable = { which = emf_independence_war_score_bonus value = -1000 }
	set_flag = emf_can_demand_religious_conversion
	set_flag = emf_castes
	clr_flag = emf_caste_opinions
	set_flag = emf_allow_in_ruler_designer
	set_flag = emf_dynamic_cult
	set_flag = emf_secret_religion
}

emf_set_default_flags_for_mazdaki = {
	set_flag = emf_playable
	clr_flag = emf_ai_peaceful
	clr_flag = emf_hostile_within_group
	set_flag = emf_ai_fabricate_claims
	set_variable = { which = emf_peace_piety_gain value = 0.0 }
	set_variable = { which = emf_ai_convert_other_groups value = 2 }
	set_variable = { which = emf_ai_convert_same_group value = 2 }
	clr_flag = emf_peace_prestige_loss
	set_variable = { which = emf_aggression value = 0.6 }
	set_flag = emf_raised_vassal_opinion_loss
	clr_flag = emf_attacking_same_religion_piety_loss
	set_variable = { which = emf_max_wives value = 1 }
	set_variable = { which = emf_max_consorts value = 0 }
	set_flag = emf_feminist
	clr_flag = emf_has_heir_designation
	set_variable = { which = emf_short_reign_opinion_year_mult value = -1000 }
	clr_flag = emf_uses_jizya_tax
	clr_flag = emf_can_retire_to_monastery
	clr_flag = emf_can_excommunicate
	set_flag = emf_can_grant_divorce
	clr_flag = emf_can_grant_invasion_cb
	clr_flag = emf_can_grant_claim
	set_flag = emf_pc_marriage
	clr_flag = emf_bs_marriage
	set_flag = emf_psc_marriage
	set_flag = emf_cousin_marriage
	clr_flag = emf_seafarer
	clr_flag = emf_allow_looting
	clr_flag = emf_allow_rivermovement
	clr_flag = emf_allow_viking_invasion
	clr_flag = emf_autocephaly
	clr_flag = emf_pentarchy
	clr_flag = emf_divine_blood
	clr_flag = emf_uses_decadence
	clr_flag = emf_can_have_antipopes
	clr_flag = emf_priests_can_marry
	set_flag = emf_priests_can_inherit
	clr_flag = emf_ignores_defensive_attrition
	clr_flag = emf_defensive_attrition

	clr_flag = emf_women_can_take_consorts
	clr_flag = emf_investiture
	clr_flag = emf_rel_head_defense
	clr_flag = emf_landed_kin_prestige_bonus

	set_variable = { which = emf_ai_convert_other_groups value = 2 }
	set_variable = { which = emf_ai_convert_same_group value = 2 }
	clr_flag = emf_peace_prestige_loss
	set_variable = { which = emf_aggression value = 1.0 }
	set_flag = emf_raised_vassal_opinion_loss
	clr_flag = emf_attacking_same_religion_piety_loss
	set_variable = { which = emf_max_wives value = 1 }
	set_variable = { which = emf_max_consorts value = 0 }
	clr_flag = emf_feminist
	clr_flag = emf_has_heir_designation
	set_variable = { which = emf_short_reign_opinion_year_mult value = -1000 }
	clr_flag = emf_uses_jizya_tax
	clr_flag = emf_can_retire_to_monastery
	clr_flag = emf_can_excommunicate
	set_flag = emf_can_grant_divorce
	clr_flag = emf_can_grant_invasion_cb
	clr_flag = emf_can_grant_claim
	clr_flag = emf_pc_marriage
	clr_flag = emf_bs_marriage
	set_flag = emf_psc_marriage
	set_flag = emf_cousin_marriage
	clr_flag = emf_seafarer
	clr_flag = emf_allow_looting
	clr_flag = emf_allow_rivermovement
	clr_flag = emf_allow_viking_invasion
	clr_flag = emf_autocephaly
	clr_flag = emf_pentarchy
	clr_flag = emf_divine_blood
	clr_flag = emf_uses_decadence
	clr_flag = emf_can_have_antipopes
	set_flag = emf_priests_can_marry
	set_flag = emf_priests_can_inherit
	clr_flag = emf_ignores_defensive_attrition
	clr_flag = emf_defensive_attrition
	set_flag = emf_matrilineal_marriages
	set_flag = emf_men_can_take_consorts
	clr_flag = emf_women_can_take_consorts
	clr_flag = emf_investiture
	clr_flag = emf_rel_head_defense
	clr_flag = emf_landed_kin_prestige_bonus
	set_flag = emf_join_crusade_if_bordering_hostile
	set_variable = { which = emf_independence_war_score_bonus value = -1000 }
	set_flag = emf_can_demand_religious_conversion
	set_flag = emf_castes
	clr_flag = emf_caste_opinions
	set_flag = emf_allow_in_ruler_designer
	set_flag = emf_dynamic_cult
	set_flag = emf_secret_religion
}

emf_set_default_flags_for_hindu = {
	set_flag = emf_playable
	set_flag = emf_ai_peaceful
	set_flag = emf_hostile_within_group
	set_flag = emf_ai_fabricate_claims
	set_variable = { which = emf_peace_piety_gain value = 0.0 }
	set_variable = { which = emf_ai_convert_other_groups value = 2 }
	set_variable = { which = emf_ai_convert_same_group value = 1 }
	clr_flag = emf_peace_prestige_loss
	set_variable = { which = emf_aggression value = 1.0 }
	set_flag = emf_raised_vassal_opinion_loss
	clr_flag = emf_attacking_same_religion_piety_loss
	set_variable = { which = emf_max_wives value = 1 }
	set_variable = { which = emf_max_consorts value = 3 }
	clr_flag = emf_feminist
	clr_flag = emf_has_heir_designation
	set_variable = { which = emf_short_reign_opinion_year_mult value = -1000 }
	clr_flag = emf_uses_jizya_tax
	clr_flag = emf_can_retire_to_monastery
	clr_flag = emf_can_excommunicate
	set_flag = emf_can_grant_divorce
	clr_flag = emf_can_grant_invasion_cb
	clr_flag = emf_can_grant_claim
	clr_flag = emf_pc_marriage
	clr_flag = emf_bs_marriage
	set_flag = emf_psc_marriage
	set_flag = emf_cousin_marriage
	clr_flag = emf_seafarer
	set_flag = emf_allow_looting
	clr_flag = emf_allow_rivermovement
	clr_flag = emf_allow_viking_invasion
	clr_flag = emf_autocephaly
	clr_flag = emf_pentarchy
	clr_flag = emf_divine_blood
	clr_flag = emf_uses_decadence
	clr_flag = emf_can_have_antipopes
	set_flag = emf_priests_can_marry
	clr_flag = emf_priests_can_inherit
	clr_flag = emf_ignores_defensive_attrition
	clr_flag = emf_defensive_attrition
	set_flag = emf_matrilineal_marriages
	set_flag = emf_men_can_take_consorts
	clr_flag = emf_women_can_take_consorts
	clr_flag = emf_investiture
	clr_flag = emf_rel_head_defense
	clr_flag = emf_landed_kin_prestige_bonus
	clr_flag = emf_join_crusade_if_bordering_hostile

	set_flag = emf_caste_opinions
	set_flag = emf_allow_in_ruler_designer
	set_flag = emf_dynamic_cult

}

	clr_flag = emf_uses_decadence

	set_flag = emf_playable
	set_flag = emf_ai_peaceful
	set_flag = emf_hostile_within_group
	set_flag = emf_ai_fabricate_claims
	set_variable = { which = emf_peace_piety_gain value = 0.0 }
	set_variable = { which = emf_ai_convert_other_groups value = 2 }
	set_variable = { which = emf_ai_convert_same_group value = 1 }
	clr_flag = emf_peace_prestige_loss
	set_variable = { which = emf_aggression value = 1.0 }
	set_flag = emf_raised_vassal_opinion_loss
	clr_flag = emf_attacking_same_religion_piety_loss
	set_variable = { which = emf_max_wives value = 1 }
	set_variable = { which = emf_max_consorts value = 3 }
	clr_flag = emf_feminist
	set_flag = emf_has_heir_designation

	clr_flag = emf_can_grant_claim
	clr_flag = emf_pc_marriage
	clr_flag = emf_bs_marriage
	set_flag = emf_psc_marriage
	set_flag = emf_cousin_marriage
	clr_flag = emf_seafarer
	clr_flag = emf_allow_looting
	clr_flag = emf_allow_rivermovement
	clr_flag = emf_allow_viking_invasion
	clr_flag = emf_autocephaly
	clr_flag = emf_pentarchy
	clr_flag = emf_divine_blood
	clr_flag = emf_uses_decadence
	clr_flag = emf_can_have_antipopes
	clr_flag = emf_priests_can_marry
	clr_flag = emf_priests_can_inherit
	clr_flag = emf_ignores_defensive_attrition
	clr_flag = emf_defensive_attrition

	set_flag = emf_men_can_take_consorts
	clr_flag = emf_women_can_take_consorts
	clr_flag = emf_investiture
	clr_flag = emf_rel_head_defense
	clr_flag = emf_landed_kin_prestige_bonus
	clr_flag = emf_join_crusade_if_bordering_hostile
	set_variable = { which = emf_independence_war_score_bonus value = -1000 }
	set_flag = emf_can_demand_religious_conversion
	set_flag = emf_castes
	clr_flag = emf_caste_opinions
	set_flag = emf_allow_in_ruler_designer
	set_flag = emf_dynamic_cult
	set_flag = emf_secret_religion
